definitions.text: loose soil rich in organic matter
the distinctive form in which a thing is made
examples: pottery of this cast was found throughout the region

definitions.text: a fungus that produces a superficial growth on various kinds of damp or decaying organic matter
a dish or dessert that is formed in or on a mold
examples: a gelatin dessert made in a mold

definitions.text: a distinctive nature, character, or type
examples: a leader in the mold of her predecessors

definitions.text: container into which liquid is poured to create a given shape when it hardens
form by pouring (e.g., wax or hot metal) into a cast or mold
make something, usually for a specific function
examples: She molded the rice balls carefully
Work the metal into a sword
